managementResponses.response:
Hi Anonymous, 
Thank you for your nice review. We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast. We do hope to see you soon!

review.title: Nice hotel easy access in and out
review.reviewText: Good breakfast and nice rooms friendly staff . This hotel offers everything we need for shirt stay in SF

managementResponses.response: We appreciate the feedback and are pleased you found such value and comfort in our offerings. Thanks for taking the time to share and for choosing our Hotel.

review.title: Nice Staff. Comfy bed, Spacious Room
review.reviewText: The time we went to San Fran all the hotels were almost sold out since there was a convention so this was our last option. It was definitely overpriced about 2 times what it normally is. However, the staff was super accommodating since we arrived about 5am and couldn't check in till around 3p, they let us store our bags so we could go out and explore the city. It was really convenient that the hotel included a breakfast buffet since there are no other restaurants around. I thought the buffet had a lot of variety. As for the hotel room it was spacious with two king beds and the beds were really comfy. The air con though was a bit confusing to use since it tends to go to heater when you put it to 70 degrees and has to be 69 or less to be cold. I did like this hotel but I wouldn't choose it again since it isn't close to the city and there isn't much around the area for food options.
review.negativeRemarks: I would say price but I think it was just the timing of what is going on in the city at the time.
review.locationRemarks: It's kind of in the middle of nowhere. It is far from the city and there aren't many options for restaurants around.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for staying with us. We have been charging for parking for the past 7 or 8 years and we do advertise this on all of our websites as well. We are the least expensive actually in SSF for parking. I do apologize for any inconvenience. I do hope you give us another try in the future. We appreciate your feedback.

review.reviewText: So bad,parking not free，room not clean，never want living again

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at the hotel.We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit!

review.title: It should be a 3 star place
review.reviewText: Noisy (freeway) comfortable rooms, clean bathroom, no restaurants nearby, great breakfast,  nice staff.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your comments, we really appreicate that you took time to give us valuable feedback. Thanks again for reviewing us so highly.

review.title: Nice hotel by the airport
review.reviewText: We loved staying here! Hot tub, good location, clean, affordable, great breakfast! Would definitely stay here again!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for staying with us.I have addressed your concerns with our crew in an effort to better handle a similar situation in the future. I hope that you had a pleasant visit to the area.

review.title: Free hot breakfast
review.reviewText: We book 2 rooms beside each other with 2 king beds in  each room, the rooms was really small When i was checking out the next day i asked the front desk person "Lupe" if the hotel has suites and she said no, then i said because the hotel is called Comfort Inn and Suites and she just ignored me!
review.negativeRemarks: Steam those carpets, they have funny smell
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport! Just stayed to sleep because was not able to extend at the other hotel we stayed in

managementResponses.response: I am glad that you had excellent stay with us. I look forward to having another opportunity to have you as our guest!

review.title: Good

review.title: Nice Hotel

review.title: Comfortable, clean good breakfast
review.reviewText: Just stayed one knight, sleeper good would stay again

managementResponses.response: We appreciate the feedback and apologize again for those hiccups with your visit. We're delighted the team was able to come through so successfully to make your stay an enjoyable one, and we look forward to sharing the kind words on your behalf. It will be a pleasure to welcome you back for a seamless return that's better characteristic of our polish and refinement.

review.title: Disappointing - bad location - rude staff
review.reviewText:
room was nice n little clean, (though mattresses n pillows were not much comfortable).
there is a railway track on one side of the hotel and you might hear sounds of trains passing by and not at all safe, other side is little better but again doesn't seem to be much safe.

Staff was also little rough especially the male at the counter. I asked him for a room away from tracks and he just refused and left ignoring the conversation. There was a lady there who understood the concern and offered a room on the front side. There is no restaurant in the hotel.

Airport shuttle is offered every 30 minutes starting 4 AM and takes several stops before dropping you at the airport. keep the change as the guy might ask you upfront for the tips at the time of pickup from hotel.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for sharing your most recent experience with us! Look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the very near future!

review.title: Nice hotel and affordable
review.reviewText: The only thing I don't like is the parking fee but other than that I'm satisfied.

managementResponses.response:
First, I apologize for not meeting your expectations with respect to your recent stay. It disappoints me to hear comments like this, after the time, efforts and expense that we have invested in our people and property.
I sincerely hope that you would give us another chance to serve you, and I can assure you that
we are continuing to work harder to give our guests a great hospitality experience each and every time.

review.reviewText: Old rooms, moldy, old bed, dirty, smelly, internet not working at all

managementResponses.response: I am gad that you enjoyed our breakfast.We hope to see you again on a future visit!

review.reviewText: Friendly staff, great breakfast! Parking was difficult as we ended up having to park on the opposite end from our room.

managementResponses.response: I do apologize that you could not have a Good night sleep and I hope that you will give us another try the next time you are in the Bay Area. We apologize for this inconvenience.

review.title: very close railload
review.reviewText:
It's very close railload, so not good for sleep.
And, banding machine doesn't work.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate the feedback and are pleased you found such value and comfort in our offerings. Thanks for taking the time to share and for choosing our Hotel.

review.title: Excellent TV, great beds, clean large bathroom.
review.reviewText: Quick, pain free check in. Good king beds in room 245. They should leave a couple bottles of water or soft drink on the fridge. USB plugs between the two beds. Great tv, but no channel guide, which requires a bit of surfing. Close to freeway but room reasonably sound proof.  Shuttle to airport also about 10-20 minutes. International is the end of the ride.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel.

Your feedback is very important to us and we can assure you that we will use this information to do everything possible to create an enjoyable experience for each of our guests. I do apologize that the credit card requirement info was overlooked at the time of booking. We hope to see you again soon!

review.title: Decent place to stay
review.reviewText: I stayed here for one night and check in was very easy.  Even though I prepaid via Expedia I had to give up an actual credit card for their deposit and I believe for parking.  Ugh!  I can't stand places that require credit cards. What if I didn't have a credit card??  I know he told me that the deposit would be returned but it was just such an inconvenience.  My room was nice and nothing to complain about.  I slept good and was able to take a warm shower.  There is no swimming pool but a hot tub outside.
review.positiveRemarks: This hotel had the most reasonable rate.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to the SFO airport.  I saw shuttles that can take guests to and from the airport.

managementResponses.response: We're sorry to hear you felt dissatisfied during your stay with us. We strive to provide all of our guests with the ideal hotel stay. We do apologize that the parking fee and the deposit information was overlooked at the time of booking.

review.title: noghtmare
review.reviewText: it's quite very upsetting that when i purchase for a room all thought that price would end there. Until we're at the hotel n a lot of hiding fees on rop of it such as parking fee, insurance fee and a deposit.. The worse of all its too late to cancel it. this is a fraud..

managementResponses.response: Thank you very much for your nice feedback, we appreciate all your comments and are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you soon again.

review.title: Nice and clean hotel

review.positiveRemarks: good room, comfortable bed, very clean
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast could be a bit better.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate the feedback and are pleased you found such value and comfort in our offerings. Thanks for taking the time to share and for choosing our Hotel.

review.title: Hotel was nice near airport
review.reviewText: Was worried when we first check in. Railroad, Bart, Highway, and planes near Hotel. We thought for sure we would be up all night. Once we were in the room could not hear any of them. Quiet Hotel. Had asked for downstairs room was given one on the third floor. But they do have an elevator so it was no problem. We would stay there again.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for sharing your most recent experience with us! We are thrilled to have read that your overall stay was an enjoyable and positive one.Look forward to welcoming you back.

review.title: Close to SFO
review.reviewText: Brilliant. We needed a place between flights for a night. Transport by shuttle was regular and easy to find. Rooms clean and tidy. Great friendly staff. Breakfast was more than adequate. Had a meal over the freeway at Pronto's - best Italian and great prices. The hotel stored our bags (we had an evening international flight) and we used the bus service (cheap and easy to use) to visit the Serramonte Shopping Centre. Would use this facility again,
review.negativeRemarks: Only things like noise are beyond the control of the hotel!
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport - 30 minute shuttles. 30 minute by bus to excellent shopping at Serramonte (mall and factory shops) - plenty of restaurnats a 10 minu
